function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid influx of air when opening a window increases the air change rate","Impact":"Potential for introducing outside contaminants and infectious agents into the indoor environment","Mitigation":"Installing air filtration systems or using window filters to reduce the influx of outside air","Technologies":"Air filtration systems, window filters","People":"Occupants of the house","Owner":"Homeowners or building management"},{"Description":"Dependence of air change rate on window width and elevation","Impact":"Uneven distribution of air change rate within the house, leading to potential pockets of stagnant or contaminated air","Mitigation":"Strategic placement of windows and use of window management systems to control airflow","Technologies":"Window management systems, automated window controls","People":"Architects, building designers, and homeowners","Owner":"Architects, building designers, homeowners"},{"Description":"Significant increase in air change rate with multiple open windows","Impact":"Heightened risk of rapid spread of airborne infectious diseases within the house","Mitigation":"Implementing guidelines for controlled window opening and use of air purifiers to reduce airborne pathogens","Technologies":"Air purifiers, smart window systems","People":"Occupants of the house","Owner":"Homeowners or building management"}]}
